text: Konstantinos Kotsaris (; born 25 July 1996) is a Greek professional footballer who plays as a goalkeeper for Apollon Smyrnis. He has represented his country at youth international levels. ==Club career== ===Panathinaikos=== Kotsaris made his senior debut for Panathinaikos on 8 January 2015, in a Greek Cup match against Chania. On 11 November 2018, in an away 1–1 draw against rivals Olympiacos forced to replace the first choice keeper Sokratis Dioudis, as the latter suffered a face injury in a strong aerial challenge from Bibras Natcho. It was his first appearance in Super League and has shown an incredible stability despite his first match. ===Apollon Smyrnis=== On 14 September 2020, Apollon Smyrnis officially announced the signing of the greek goalkeeper on a free transfer. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- ! rowspan=2 | Club ! rowspan=2 | Season ! colspan=3 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | Continental ! colspan=2 | Other ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
